short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This new tab experience combines Fox News’s popular content with Yahoo Search, offering a starting point for your online session.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start your day with everything you need from Fox News, powered by Yahoo. This unique homepage experience brings together top Fox News content and breaking news with the power of Yahoo Search, giving you a complete launchpad for your online journey. Enjoy features like:

📰 A dedicated Fox News content stream

🔍 Yahoo-powered search bar

🧾 Additional Yahoo widgets for convenience

🖼️ Dynamic, rotating imagery

✉️ Mail widget for easy access to your inbox

🛜 Quicklinks for faster browsing

Stay connected to everything you care about, all in one place.
